Home About

Me

In my spare time I enjoy snorkeling, bouldering and gaming. When working independently and trying to get work done I will repeatedly fall prey to distractions, and every now and then I can stumble into some deep rabbit holes.

Professional

As a psychologist educated and licenced in Norway, I've spent several years working in departments of the Norwegian hospitals specializing on assertively meeting the mental health needs of individuals, families and the community at large.

This website

This website uses Plausible.io for web analytics, a privacy friendly alternative.

Domain Disclaimer

Why did I chose this domain? First and foremost, I wanted something memorable. My hope is that you got a strong emotional reaction when reading werner.best. Maybe you also think "Good on him for being happy with himself!", or "Who does he think he is?". Either way, your strong reaction will probably make you remember. Secondly, I hope that search engines will rank this page higher when searching for "Best psychologist". Another consideration for choosing domain was price, and as no one in their right mind would consider getting such a pretentious and self-glorifying domain, it was by far the cheaper option.
